archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: IF-00815 ISIS to MyUWE HEAR record
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: To display HEAR record on portal. The Higher Education Achievement Report (HEAR) at UWE Bristol is an electronic report that will capture academic achievements and extra curricular activities during students time at the University. What type of information will HEAR capture? - personal details. Information on student qualification. Details on the modules studied and results. Additional information on student UWE Bristol verified extra curricular achievements.
